alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:28PM CDT until August 10 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...EASTERN CRAIGHEAD...EASTERN POINSETT... MISSISSIPPI...NORTHERN CRITTENDEN...SOUTHERN DUNKLIN...WESTERN TIPTON AND SOUTHWESTERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 1028 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hornersville to near Caraway to 6 miles northwest of Marked Tree, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Osceola, Trumann, Gosnell, Manila, Marked Tree, Harrisburg, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Monette, Caraway, Luxora, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Cardwell and Hornersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
